TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Keyboard extends System.Object
public ref class Keyboard abstract sealed

summary.span: Represents the keyboard device.

span.span: Represents the keyboard device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了与键盘相关的事件、 方法和属性，它们提供有关键盘的状态信息。The class provides keyboard-related events, methods, and properties that provide information regarding the state of the keyboard. 每个事件的定义为附加的事件还会重新显示由基元素类和作为新的路由事件。Each of the events that defines as an attached event is also re-exposed by the base element classes and as a new routed event. 通常情况下，它是更方便地处理的应用程序的键盘事件并，而不是使用事件。Generally, it is more convenient to handle keyboard events for an application on and , rather than using the events. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 为了使元素可接收键盘输入，该元素必须是可获得焦点。In order for an element to receive keyboard input, the element must be focusable. 大多数派生的对象是默认情况下可获得焦点。Most derived objects are focusable by default. 否则，若要使元素可获得焦点，设置属性的基本元素`true`。Otherwise, to make an element focusable, set the property on the base element to `true`. 有关基元素的详细信息，请参阅[基元素概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。For more information on the base elements, see [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md). 类，如并，设置的默认值到`false`。 classes, such as and , set the default value of to `false`. 因此，对于这些对象能够获取键盘焦点必须设置为`true`。Therefore, for these objects to obtain keyboard focus, must be set to `true`. 键盘焦点指接收键盘输入的对象。Keyboard focus refers to the object that is receiving keyboard input. 具有键盘焦点的元素具有设置为`true`。The element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 可以有键盘焦点放在整个桌面上只有一个元素。There can be only one element with keyboard focus on the entire desktop. 逻辑焦点指具有焦点的焦点范围内的对象。Logical focus refers to the object within a focus scope that has focus. 焦点、 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)并[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 静态成员主类委托调用线程，因此他们不一定是线程安全。The static members of the class delegate to the primary of the calling thread, so they are not necessarily thread-safe. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来确定键是否处于切换状态。The following example shows how to use the method to determine if a key is in the toggled state. 如果传递给是切换，更改按钮的背景。If the passed to is toggled, the background of a button is changed. [!code-csharp[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardIsToggled](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyeventargskeyboardistoggled)] [!code-vb[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardIsToggled](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyeventargskeyboardistoggled)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void ClearFocus() cil managed

summary.span: Clears focus.

span.span: Clears focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果焦点位于 Win32 窗口中，WPF 会调用还原焦点时关闭菜单上的方法。If focus is within a Win32 window, WPF calls the method on restoration of focus when a menu is closed. Win32 焦点时退出菜单模式，将返回到托管子 HWND，且没有的元素具有 WPF 焦点。When leaving menu mode, Win32 focus is returned to the hosted child HWND, and no element has WPF focus.

The element with keyboard focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于元素可接收键盘输入，该元素必须是可获得焦点。For an element to receive keyboard input, the element must be focusable. 若要使元素可获得焦点，设置属性的基本元素`true`。To make an element focusable, set the property on the base element to `true`. 有关基元素的详细信息，请参阅[基元素概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。For more information on the base elements, see [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md). 类，如并，设置的默认值到`false`; 因此，对于这些对象能够获取键盘焦点必须设置为`true`。 classes, such as and , set the default value of to `false`; therefore, for these objects to obtain keyboard focus, must be set to `true`. 键盘焦点指接收键盘输入的对象。Keyboard focus refers to the object that is receiving keyboard input. 具有键盘焦点的元素具有设置为`true`。The element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 可以有键盘焦点放在整个桌面上只有一个元素。There can be only one element with keyboard focus on the entire desktop. 逻辑焦点指具有焦点的焦点范围内的对象。Logical focus refers to the object within a focus scope that has focus. 焦点、 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)并[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 具有键盘焦点的元素还具有逻辑焦点的元素所属的焦点范围。An element with keyboard focus also has logical focus for the focus scope the element belongs to. 具有逻辑焦点的元素可能会或可能不具有键盘焦点。An element with logical focus may or may not have keyboard focus. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件处理程序上设置键盘焦点。The following example shows a event handler that sets keyboard focus on a . [!code-csharp[focussample#FocusSampleSetFocus](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#focussamplesetfocus)] [!code-vb[focussample#FocusSampleSetFocus](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#focussamplesetfocus)]

The focused element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键盘焦点指接收键盘输入的对象。Keyboard focus refers to the object that is receiving keyboard input. 具有键盘焦点的元素具有设置为`true`。The element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 可以有键盘焦点放在整个桌面上只有一个元素。There can be only one element with keyboard focus on the entire desktop. 逻辑焦点指具有焦点的焦点范围内的对象。Logical focus refers to the object within a focus scope that has focus. 焦点、 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)并[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 具有键盘焦点的元素还具有逻辑焦点的元素所属的焦点范围。An element with keyboard focus also has logical focus for the focus scope the element belongs to. 具有逻辑焦点的元素可能会或可能不具有键盘焦点。An element with logical focus may or may not have keyboard focus. ## Examples 下面的示例获取具有键盘焦点的元素，并将强制转换到。The following example gets the element with keyboard focus and casts it to a . 如果具有键盘焦点的元素是，更改元素的背景。If the element with keyboard focus is a , the background of the element is changed. [!code-csharp[focussample#GetKeyboardFocusedElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#getkeyboardfocusedelement)] [!code-vb[focussample#GetKeyboardFocusedElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#getkeyboardfocusedelement)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Windows.Input.KeyStates GetKeyStates(valuetype System.Windows.Input.Key key) cil managed

param.name: key
param.span: The specified key.

span.span: The specified key.

summary.span: Gets the set of key states for the specified key.

span.span: Gets the set of key states for the specified key.

returns.span: A bitwise combination of the values.

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个位字段枚举;因此，很可能有多个状态的密钥。 is a bit field enumeration; therefore, it is possible for a key to be in multiple states. 例如，一个密钥可能是在按下状态，也可以处于切换状态。For example, a key could be in the pressed state as well as in the toggled state. 使用位比较运算来确定完全一致的状态或键所处的状态。Use bit comparison operations to determine the exact state or states the key is in. 类提供了大量静态方法，它们还可用于获取键的状态信息。The class provides a number of static methods which can also be used to obtain key state information. 方法是： ， ，和。The methods are: , , and . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以确定键位于状态。The following example shows how to use the method to determine if the key is in the state. 位 AND 运算用于比较从返回和状态。A bit AND operation is used to compare the returned from and the state. 如果密钥已关闭的背景发生更改。If the key is down, the background of a is changed. [!code-csharp[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardGetKeyStates](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyeventargskeyboardgetkeystates)] [!code-vb[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardGetKeyStates](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyeventargskeyboardgetkeystates)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent GotKeyboardFocusEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly GotKeyboardFocusEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: Identifies the attached event.

span.span: Identifies the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由的事件，并将结果存储为注册路由的事件的类上的字段时，创建路由的事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event. 这些标识符包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和用于添加事件所有者的实用工具方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event. 您经常使用这些标识符作为事件系统方法的参数来标识特定路由的事件。You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsKeyDown(valuetype System.Windows.Input.Key key) cil managed

param.name: key
param.span: The specified key.

span.span: The specified key.

summary.span: Determines whether the specified key is pressed.

span.span: Determines whether the specified key is pressed.

returns.span: if is in the down state; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以用于确定的特定键状态集。The method can be used to determine the set of states of a specific key. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来确定特定键的状态。The following example shows how to use the method to determine the state of a specific key. 密钥传递给方法。The key is passed to the method. 如果该方法返回`true`的背景发生更改。If the method returns `true`, the background of a is changed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由的事件，并将结果存储为注册路由的事件的类上的字段时，创建路由的事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event. 这些标识符包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和用于添加事件所有者的实用工具方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event. 您经常使用这些标识符作为事件系统方法的参数来标识特定路由的事件。You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个位字段枚举，因此很可能同时按下的多个修改键。 is a bit field enumeration, so it is possible for multiple modifier keys to be pressed at the same time. 使用位运算，以确定确切的一组的修改键已按下。Use bit operations to determine the exact set of modifier keys pressed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用位 AND 比较来确定如果按下修改键。The following example uses a bit AND comparison to determine if the modifier key is pressed. [!code-csharp[keyargssnippetsample#KeyboardModifiersBitOperation](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyboardmodifiersbitoperation)] [!code-vb[keyargssnippetsample#KeyboardModifiersBitOperation](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyboardmodifiersbitoperation)]
